text: The trick to overcoming shame is to preempt it. Learn to recognize guilt and then, before it can metastasize into shame, turn it into something else â€“ a resolve to improve, to grow beyond your mistakes.
Guilt and shame are two different things. You feel guilt when you did a bad thing. You feel shame when you believe that you're a bad *person*.
My advice to my coworkers regarding interpersonal matters is distressingly Machiavellian.
